attributes.action: Abolish the TV license and let the B.B.C. fund itself like every other TV station in the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should be able to decide if we want to pay for the B.B.C. channels or pay SKY or NTL for the privelige and not both.Paying Johnathon Ross 18 million for 3 years work seems a massive waste of the license fee and a massive mickey take.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
